EmailTemplate.description: AT Executed NAVDB SA - New Customer Final email
EmailTemplate.name: AT Executed NAVDB SA
EmailTemplate.subject: NavDB SA [Invoice #] {!Case.Account} {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear xxxxx,
Thank you for returning the signed service agreement on behalf of xxxxx and for selecting Honeywell as your NavDB Service Provider. Enclosed is a fully executed document for your records. Also included is the Invoice xxxxx for the first year of service.
We are pleased to have you as a customer and I look forward to working with you in the future. If you have any questions or if I can be of any assistance, please don â€™t hesitate to contact me.
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative
602-436-6739
Fax: 602-822-7333
email: AISACCOUNTSERVICES@HONEYWELL.COM
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact the Technical Operations Center at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
